      • partiallyWrap

        public static Attribute partiallyWrap(Attribute attribute)
        Converts from OpenDJ server Attribute to OpenDJ LDAP SDK Attribute. This method is an optimization of the equivalent from() method. It's only used in encoding/decoding and as such only wrap the required methods: the returned object partially wrap the incoming one.
        Parameters:
        attribute - value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value

      • from

        public static List<Attribute> from(Iterable<Attribute> listOfAttributes)
        Converts from an Iterable of OpenDJ server Attribute to a List of OpenDJ LDAP SDK Attribute.
        Parameters:
        listOfAttributes - value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value

      • from

        public static SearchResultEntry from(SearchResultEntry srvResultEntry)

        srvResultEntry - value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value

      • partiallyWrap

        public static SearchResultEntry partiallyWrap(SearchResultEntry srvResultEntry,
                                              int ldapVersion)
        Converts from OpenDJ server SearchResultEntry to OpenDJ LDAP SDK SearchResultEntry. This method is an optimization of the equivalent from() method. It's only used in encoding/decoding and as such only wrap the required methods: the returned object partially wrap the incoming one.
        Parameters:
        srvResultEntry - value to convert
        ldapVersion - Version of the ldap protocol
        Returns:
        the converted value

        public static Entry from(Entry srvResultEntry)
        Converts from OpenDJ server Entry to OpenDJ LDAP SDK Entry.
        Parameters:
        srvResultEntry - value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value

        public static SearchScope from(VirtualAttributeCfgDefn.Scope srvScope)
        Converts from OpenDJ server VirtualAttributeCfgDefn.Scope to OpenDJ LDAP SDK SearchScope.
        Parameters:
        srvScope - The server scope value.
        Returns:
        The SDK scope value.

      • getResponseResult

        public static <T extends Result> T getResponseResult(Operation operation,
                                                     T result)
                                              throws LdapException
        Populates the result object with the operation details and return the result object if it was successful. Otherwise, it throws an LdapException.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the result object
        Parameters:
        operation - used to populate the result
        result - the result object to populate from the Operation
        Returns:
        the result if successful, an LdapException is thrown otherwise
        Throws:
        LdapException - when an error occurs

      • getResponseResult

        public static Result getResponseResult(Operation operation)
                                throws LdapException
        Converts the OpenDJ server Operation object into an OpenDJ LDAP SDK Result object.
        Parameters:
        operation - value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value
        Throws:
        LdapException - when an error occurs

        public static ByteString getCredentials(byte[] authenticationValue)
        Converts from byte[] to OpenDJ server ByteString.
        Parameters:
        authenticationValue - value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value
